name: Strong aluminum lightweight camera handle with a rubber coated grip
description:
An ideal solution for stabilizing the shot you are filming. 

CamHand is designed to fit almost any camera including slr, digital compact cameras, camcorders and GoPro. The tripod mount makes it quick and easy to attach your camera. It can also be attached horizontally in order to film a smooth panning shot when hold close to your chest.

SLR cameras are not originally designed for videographers. This camera handle makes it alot easier to get smooth shots on the move with SLR cameras and GoPros. 

Perfect for skateboarding lines, snowboarding, rollerblading, BMX and more.

Maximum Camera Height: 90mm
Maximum Camera Length from tripod mount: 68mm
Maximum Weight: 30kg
